definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
to reflect (light)/to shine/to project (an image onto a screen etc)

sentences.english: An edited version will also be played in movie theaters.
sentences.chinese: 剪辑版的短片也将在电影院上映。

sentences.english: But this merely is a result which 600 theaters screens.
sentences.chinese: 但这仅仅是600余家影院上映的结果。

sentences.english: The first film is tentatively scheduled to hit theaters in 2009.
sentences.chinese: 而三部曲的第一部暂定将于2009年上映。

sentences.english: It is expected to be released during the Christmas season in 2011.
sentences.chinese: 本片预期在2011年圣诞节期间上映。

sentences.english: Every film showing in China that record- breaking week was a local production.
sentences.chinese: 在那打破记录的一周上映的电影都是国产片。

sentences.english: A new television series is the latest dramatisation of the Camelot myth.
sentences.chinese: 最近上映的一部电视剧是以卡米洛特的神话为题材的。

sentences.english: Movie-goers can expect to see magnificent battle scenes in the upcoming film.
sentences.chinese: 观众将会在即将上映的电影看到壮观战斗场面。

sentences.english: It was only re-released for the public in the mid-1950s.
sentences.chinese: 50年代中期，本片开始重新公开上映。

sentences.english: Heute lauft der Film "Ein Amerikaner in Paris". Kommen Sie mit?
sentences.chinese: 今天上映电影《美国人在巴黎》。您一起来吗？

sentences.english: KOMA participated in the movie "Cage People" .
sentences.chinese: 家驹参与演出的《笼民》正式上映。

sentences.english: It's in U.S. theaters now. Hopefully, there will be a Chinese version soon.
sentences.chinese: 正在美国电影院上映，希望很快能有个中文版。

sentences.english: Franchise releases will pick up in coming weeks.
sentences.chinese: 未来几周还有几部大片即将上映。

sentences.english: Are there any Chinese movies playing in town?
sentences.chinese: 本镇有什么中国电影上映吗？

sentences.english: The movie which I long-waited was released today.
sentences.chinese: 我期待已久的电影今天上映了。

sentences.english: Many people wanted new films on during the holidays.
sentences.chinese: 许多人希望节日期间上映新影片。

sentences.english: Shah Rukh, who is busy shooting for his forthcoming film "Ra."
sentences.chinese: 沙鲁克，谁是他即将上映的影片“镭忙拍。

definition: to premiere (a movie or TV show)/premiere (of a movie)/first-run (movie)/to greet (the eye) before anything else (e.g. when entering a room)
to act the leading role (in a movie or a play)/to star/lead actor
theater chain (abbr. for 電影院線|电影院线)
(of a movie, show etc) to attract large audiences
slot within a schedule/timeslot (for a TV program, a session with a photographer etc)/range of dates in which an event is to be held (film screening, exhibition etc)
